price: Basi wakapanga mipango yao, na Sisi tukapanga mipango yetu, na wao hawatambui.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ
footnotes: Walipanga kumuuwa Swaleh na ahali zake, na Mwenyezi Mungu nyuma yao kapanga kumwokoa Nabii wake na ahali zake, na kuwateketeza wao, na hali wao hata hawatambui.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
